Subject: Update failing again
Description:
Appliance update is failing again this month. Please assist with this issue.

Thank you!
What_We_Know__c:
- it's not the first time the customer encountered this issue
- the server version in mysql is the same as on the server
- upgrade log was empty
- telnet to upgrade.endpointprotector was successful
- after removing the erroneous patch, the upgrade was still unsuccessful and the
- progress bar didn't disappear even after removing the .json file
- collected the upgrade logs from the server
- opened R&D escalation to further assist

server was upgraded to 5941 using the offline patch.
the customer is also considering migrating to a new instance
Solution_Comment__c: Solved during remote session by applying the offline patch
